Name: BetterSounds
Description:
Replaces the wimpy bolt release sound with a more realistic and satisfying metallic click.
Gives the suppressed shots for all Intermediate and most Fullpower cartridges a little more 'oomph' and 'pop'.
Adds realistic ARMA style supersonic cracks when a bullet whizzes by. (To disable, remove the BetterSoundsBullets.hotmod file)
This is a work in progress, let me know what other sounds could be improved/replaced.
ShortDescription: More realistic bolt release, supressed shots, and bullet whixx sounds
